it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.conditions

Class MaxDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.conditions.Distance
      • it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.conditions.MaxDistance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition

    public class MaxDistance
extends Distance
    This condition checks whether the distance between the attacker and the target tile is less than the amount member variable.
    Author:
    andreahuang

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaxDistance

        public MaxDistance(java.lang.Integer amount,
                   boolean self,
                   boolean finalIsTile,
                   boolean initialIsTile,
                   boolean lazy,
                   java.lang.String actionUnitName)
        Default constructor. Sets up all parameters for check evaluation.
        Parameters:
        amount - is an intenger indicating the distance
        self - boolean indicating whether the first tile to consider is the attacker or not
        finalIsTile - boolean indicating whether the last tile is calculated from a tile input or player target input.
        initialIsTile - boolean indicating whether the last tile is calculated from a tile input or player target input.
        lazy - when evaluating a list of destination tile list, if true only one tile needs to meet the check, otherwise all tiles need to meet the check
        actionUnitName - the name of the action unit from which

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public boolean check(Game game,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Targetable>> targets)
        Checks whether the distance between a first tile and a final tile is less than the specified amount.
        Specified by:
        check in interface Condition
        Overrides:
        check in class Distance
        Parameters:
        game - the game on which to perform the evaluation.
        targets - the targets is the input of the current player. Either tiles or players.
        Returns:
        true if distance is less, false otherwise.
